CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide Android status bar
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Hide the Android status bar to use full screen for map display

ListPreference.android:title: Screen Orientation
ListPreference.android:summary: Defines the orientation of the screen

ListPreference.android:title: Rotate map
ListPreference.android:summary: Rotate map basing on compass direction or GPS

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Info status bar
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show the info status bar. Displaying speed, height, icons etc..

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show GPS Position values
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show the current GPS position values. Display format is defined by the selected grid

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show GPS Heading and Bearing
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show the current heading and bearing (when navigation active), basing on GPS data.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Track info
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show length and duration of selected track in statusline. If no track selected, active track info is shown.

ListPreference.android:title: Navigation Display
ListPreference.android:summary: Defines the type and size of the navigation display. The navigation display is visible while navigating to a waypoint or route

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use ETA instead of ETE
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Display ETA (Estimated time of arrival) instead of ETE (Estimated time enroute) when navigate

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Screen stays on
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: While 'MM Tracker' is running, the screen stays on (consumes more battery!)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show scale
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show scale of map on the bottom of display
